name: rxjs-react-poc
description: Just a seed for RxJS + React + Webpack
author: eryk.piast@gmail.com

scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development; npm run clean && webpack-dashboard -- webpack-dev-server --config infra/webpack/config.dev.js
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test; mocha-webpack --ui tdd --webpack-config infra/webpack/config.mocha.js --require source-map-support/register --include babel-polyfill "src/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test:dev: export NODE_ENV=test; mocha-webpack --ui tdd --webpack-config infra/webpack/config.mocha.js --require source-map-support/register --include babel-polyfill --watch
scripts.update-gh-pages: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run compile
scripts.publish: git add dist/ && git commit -m "update compiled files" dist && git push; exit 0
scripts.postpublish: git push origin master --tags && npm run update-gh-pages
scripts.release:patch: npm run publish && npm version patch && npm run postpublish
scripts.release:minor: npm run publish && npm version minor && npm run postpublish
scripts.release:major: npm run publish && npm version major && npm run postpublish
scripts.pre:patch: npm run publish && npm version prepatch && npm run postpublish
scripts.pre:minor: npm run publish && npm version preminor && npm run postpublish
scripts.pre:major: npm run publish && npm version premajor && npm run postpublish
scripts.pre: npm run publish && npm version pre && npm run postpublish
